tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE investor_sentiment (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    investor_name VARCHAR(255),
    social_media_platform VARCHAR(100),
    sentiment_score INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    investor_id INT,
    post_text TEXT,
    post_date DATE,
    post_likes INT,
    post_comments INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (investor_id) REFERENCES investor_sentiment(id)
);

CREATE TABLE investor_sentiment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investor_name VARCHAR(255),
    social_media_handle VARCHAR(255),
    sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investor_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    likes_count INT,
    shares_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE investor_sentiment_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    social_media_platform VARCHAR(100),
    post_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    date_posted DATE
);

CREATE TABLE InvestorsPosts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investor_id INT,
    post_text TEXT,
    post_date DATETIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (investor_id) REFERENCES InvestorsSentiment(id)
);
